verses.text: \w Sing|strong="H7442"\w*, O \w barren|strong="H6135"\w*, thou \add that\add* didst not \w bear|strong="H3205"\w*; break \w forth|strong="H6476"\w* into \w singing|strong="H7440"\w*, and cry \w aloud|strong="H6670"\w*, thou \add that\add* didst not travail with \w child|strong="H2342"\w*: for \w more|strong="H7227"\w* \add are\add* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of the \w desolate|strong="H8074"\w* than the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of the married \w wife|strong="H1166"\w*, \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

\w Enlarge|strong="H7337"\w* the \w place|strong="H4725"\w* of thy \w tent|strong="H0168"\w*, and let them stretch \w forth|strong="H5186"\w* the \w curtains|strong="H3407"\w* of thine \w habitations|strong="H4908"\w*: \w spare|strong="H2820"\w* not, \w lengthen|strong="H0748"\w* thy \w cords|strong="H4340"\w*, and \w strengthen|strong="H2388"\w* thy \w stakes|strong="H3489"\w*;

For thou shalt break \w forth|strong="H6555"\w* on the right \w hand|strong="H3225"\w* and on the \w left|strong="H8040"\w*; and thy \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* shall \w inherit|strong="H3423"\w* the \w Gentiles|strong="H1471"\w*, and make the \w desolate|strong="H8074"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* to be \w inhabited|strong="H3427"\w*.

\w Fear|strong="H3372"\w* not; for thou shalt not be \w ashamed|strong="H0954"\w*: neither be thou \w confounded|strong="H3637"\w*; for thou shalt not be put to \w shame|strong="H2659"\w*: for thou shalt \w forget|strong="H7911"\w* the \w shame|strong="H1322"\w* of thy \w youth|strong="H5934"\w*, and shalt not \w remember|strong="H2142"\w* the \w reproach|strong="H2781"\w* of thy \w widowhood|strong="H0491"\w* any more.

For thy \w Maker|strong="H6213"\w* \add is\add* thine \w husband|strong="H1166"\w*; the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w* \add is\add* his \w name|strong="H8034"\w*; and thy \w Redeemer|strong="H1350"\w* the Holy \w One|strong="H6918"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*; The \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of the whole \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* shall he be \w called|strong="H7121"\w*.\f + \fr 54.5 \ft Maker: Heb. Makers\f*

For the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath \w called|strong="H7121"\w* thee as a \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* \w forsaken|strong="H5800"\w* and \w grieved|strong="H6087"\w* in \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w*, and a \w wife|strong="H0802"\w* of \w youth|strong="H5271"\w*, when thou wast \w refused|strong="H3988"\w*, \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

For a \w small|strong="H6996"\w* \w moment|strong="H7281"\w* have I \w forsaken|strong="H5800"\w* thee; but with \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w mercies|strong="H7356"\w* will I \w gather|strong="H6908"\w* thee.

In a \w little|strong="H8241"\w* \w wrath|strong="H7110"\w* I \w hid|strong="H5641"\w* my \w face|strong="H6440"\w* from thee for a \w moment|strong="H7281"\w*; but with \w everlasting|strong="H5769"\w* \w kindness|strong="H2617"\w* will I have \w mercy|strong="H7355"\w* on thee, \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w Redeemer|strong="H1350"\w*.

For this \add is as\add* the \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* of \w Noah|strong="H5146"\w* unto me: for \add as\add* I have \w sworn|strong="H7650"\w* that the \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* of \w Noah|strong="H5146"\w* should no more go \w over|strong="H5674"\w* the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*; so have I \w sworn|strong="H7650"\w* that I would not be \w wroth|strong="H7107"\w* with thee, nor \w rebuke|strong="H1605"\w* thee.

For the \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w* shall \w depart|strong="H4185"\w*, and the \w hills|strong="H1389"\w* be \w removed|strong="H4131"\w*; but my \w kindness|strong="H2617"\w* shall not \w depart|strong="H4185"\w* from thee, neither shall the \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* of my \w peace|strong="H7965"\w* be \w removed|strong="H4131"\w*, \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* that hath \w mercy|strong="H7355"\w* on thee.

¶ O thou \w afflicted|strong="H6041"\w*, tossed with \w tempest|strong="H5590"\w*, \add and\add* not \w comforted|strong="H5162"\w*, behold, I will \w lay|strong="H7257"\w* thy \w stones|strong="H0068"\w* with fair \w colours|strong="H6320"\w*, and lay thy \w foundations|strong="H3245"\w* with \w sapphires|strong="H5601"\w*.

And I will \w make|strong="H7760"\w* thy \w windows|strong="H8121"\w* of \w agates|strong="H3539"\w*, and thy \w gates|strong="H8179"\w* of \w carbuncles|strong="H0068"\w*, and all thy \w borders|strong="H1366"\w* of \w pleasant|strong="H2656"\w* \w stones|strong="H0068"\w*.

And all thy \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \add shall be\add* \w taught|strong="H3928"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; and \w great|strong="H7227"\w* \add shall be\add* the \w peace|strong="H7965"\w* of thy \w children|strong="H1121"\w*.

In \w righteousness|strong="H6666"\w* shalt thou be \w established|strong="H3559"\w*: thou shalt be \w far|strong="H7368"\w* from \w oppression|strong="H6233"\w*; for thou shalt not \w fear|strong="H3372"\w*: and from \w terror|strong="H4288"\w*; for it shall not come \w near|strong="H7126"\w* thee.

Behold, they shall \w surely|strong="H1481"\w* gather \w together|strong="H1481"\w*, \add but\add* \w not|strong="H0657"\w* by me: \w whosoever|strong="H4310"\w* shall gather \w together|strong="H1481"\w* against thee shall \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* for thy sake.

Behold, I have \w created|strong="H1254"\w* the \w smith|strong="H2796"\w* that \w bloweth|strong="H5301"\w* the \w coals|strong="H6352"\w* in the \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*, and that bringeth \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* an \w instrument|strong="H3627"\w* for his \w work|strong="H4639"\w*; and I have \w created|strong="H1254"\w* the \w waster|strong="H7843"\w* to \w destroy|strong="H2254"\w*.

¶ No \w weapon|strong="H3627"\w* that is \w formed|strong="H3335"\w* against thee shall \w prosper|strong="H6743"\w*; and every \w tongue|strong="H3956"\w* \add that\add* shall \w rise|strong="H6965"\w* against thee in \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w* thou shalt \w condemn|strong="H7561"\w*. This \add is\add* the \w heritage|strong="H5159"\w* of the \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, and their \w righteousness|strong="H6666"\w* \add is\add* of me, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.
